page.title: 19COMMODITY PRICES:JULY 1985
page.content: In April 1985 the annual Budget took place.Prices have tended to rise since then.Here is a selection of different items and their current prices: 2 bedroomed flat_Â£33950 2 bedroomed end terraced house_Â£48950 3 bedroomed semi_detatched house_Â£58950 4 bedroomed detatched house_Â£95000 Austin Rover Mini_Â£3600 Ford Sierra_Â£6000 Vacuum cleaner_Â£80 Hi_Fi up to Â£300 Video and T.V._Â£600 Loaf of bread_40p Pint of milk_23p 1/2 dozen eggs_43p 80 tea bags_99p 4oz jar of coffee_Â£1.59 2lb of sugar_49p 1lb of potatoes_12p 1lb Scotch Beef_Â£1.99
